text:
(Actually 1.7.2, but Bugzilla doesn't know about that version)

If I change the HTTP Proxy's configuration (include/exclude patterns or proxy
port) while the proxy is running, the change doesn't take effect until the proxy
is restarted.  One of the following should be done:
  1. make the proxy react immediately to config changes
  2. ghost out the GUI elements in question while the proxy is running

(1) would be ideal but is probably a lot more difficult. (2) would be quite
sufficient.  It's only the current combination that's confusing -- "I change it,
but it doesn't change, darnit!"
creator: eric_97@pobox.com

text:
I've made a restart button that becomes enabled if and when you change the
filtering parameters while the proxy is running.  Not as good as 1, but better
than 2.
creator: mstover1@apache.org
